name: Dragon Hell of Fire: Dragon Story Puzzle Game
name_original: Dragon Hell of Fire: Dragon Story Puzzle Game
description:
Dragons Hell of Fire is the crazy chain reaction game that has already had millions and millions of levels played since it was introduced early this year. Come join the fun!

• Simple Objective: Transform dragons into fire with a limited # of taps
• Full Retina & iPhone 5 support!
• New PowerUps! will help you get through the hard levels!
• FREE tips EVERY DAY!

Can you go all the way? Come join the fun
